text: Make Some Noise is the third studio album by the Australian-American hard rock band The Dead Daisies. It was released on August 9, 2016, by Spitfire Music. ==Track listing== Songwriting credits via disc booklet: all tracks written by Doug Aldrich, John Corabi, Marti Frederiksen, David Lowy, Marco Mendoza & Brian Tichy andunless otherwise noted. ==Personnel== Credits are adapted from disc booklet. *Doug Aldrich – guitar *John Corabi – vocals, acoustic guitar *David Lowy – guitar *Marco Mendoza \- bass, backing vocals *Brian Tichy – drums ;Additional personnel *Marti Frederiksen - backing vocals *Suzie McNeil - harmonica, backing vocals ;Production *Marti Frederiksen - production *Anthony Focx - mixing *Ross Hogarth - engineering *Kyle Richards, Dave Latto - assistant engineering *Kari Smith - production coordinator *Howie Weinberg - mastering *Gentry Studer - assistant mastering *Freimauer.com - art direction, graphic design *Oliver Halfin, Katarina Benzova - photography *David Edwards - management ==Chart performance== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- ! Chart (2016) ! Peak position |- | Austrian Albums Chart |align="center"|34 |- | Belgian Albums Chart (Flanders) |align="center"|166 |- | Belgian Albums Chart (Wallonia) |align="center"|159 |- | French Albums Chart |align="center"|160 |- |German Albums Chart |align="center"|22 |- |Swiss Albums Chart |align="center"|10 |- |UK Albums Chart |align="center"|35 |- | |- | |- | |- |} ==References== Category:2016 albums Category:The Dead Daisies albums Category:Albums produced by Marti Frederiksen
title: Make Some Noise (The Dead Daisies album)
